ICSP_CLK.description: Clock pin for ICSP programming of the onboard PIC MCU

ICSP_DATA.description: Data pin for ICSP programming of the onboard PIC MCU

ICSP_PROG_EN.description: Program enable pin for ICSP programming of the onboard PIC MCU

ICSP_MCLR.description: Master clear (reset) pin for ICSP programming of the onboard PIC MCU
